headline: Lennar Price Cuts Reshape Housing Demand Margins And Valuation Outlook
summary: Lennar (NYSE:LEN) is cutting prices on new homes in response to a deepening housing affordability crisis. The company is reporting pressure on order backlog, free cash flow margins, and return on invested capital as a result of these price actions. Management has described the current level of price reductions as unprecedented for Lennar. Lennar is one of the largest homebuilders in the US, so its response to affordability pressures is relevant for anyone watching the housing cycle. With...
